name: Guardian
description: Guardians are active protectors of their community. They uphold server rules and would be excellent moderators.
extra: If yoy're currently a moderator or interested in being one, check out the Discord Moderator Academy.

name: Mentor
description: Mentors have a lot of safety information to share with online friends. If someone has a question about reporting or safety tools, you have the Discord Safety Center handy.

name: Invisible Force
description: When you're the Invisible Force, you make safety moves in silence, getting rid of online evil by blocking and reporting stealthily.
extra: Keep the Discord Help Center handy to stay proactivly safe.

name: Healer
description: Healers are important in creating safe environments for others because of their empathy. They love sharing mental health resources with their community.
extra: Keep the Discord Help Center handy to stay proactivly safe.
